title: If I cry everyday, will I die? Or what will happen to me? - Quora

response.answer_text: No one cry without any reason . Yah you must be in depression you will cry . But you will not die . Crying burst out all your inner emotion . If we cry whatever bad raw material in mind it comes out we feel good from inside. People who don't cry if they hurt badly from inside they die ,they can do suicide because mind need moral support of people around. According do medical science one should cry at least one time in a month or two. Like smile is important crying is also important. When we cry all waste & garbage thoughts comes with our tears. Now come to in your case . Actually question is illogical no one cry everyday because we are surround by love ones or people around & everyone care us . If we cry two or three time even ten times people come to know you are mentally I'll. They take you psychiatrist .Psychiatrist will give you medical treatment & after sometime you will be fine . Depression is not a permanent disease .Medicine intake of depression not life time . In simple words you will not die even if you cry for a month. For a kind information we cannot struck with one thought in our mind. And we cannot take our lives by ourselves. We need water & food time to time until & unless we live . cry cry :):).

If you cry everyday it is called as self pity. Only if others feel sorry for us, and help us it is worth crying. A little crying to get over the pain and sorrow is good to relieve us and it helps to relax. But continuing to cry everyday over something is not good for our body, mind and for our self confidence. We all feel like this sometimes in our life. Crying is a waste of time, energy, tears, water and salt from your body. Your body needs salt and water for proper conduction of messages in your nervous system. Water is essential for all activities in our body. Too much crying when really sad can lead to depression, blood pressure because of the stress of loneliness. But it will not kill you so soon. You will only pass time all sad and filled with negative thoughts,swollen eyes, headache, dryness and depression. So get up, stop all this and move on. Feel fresh and reborn. Wear good clothes, eat well and don't let anybody make you cry. You are a strong person. My best wishes and prayers are with you.
